text: Silvana Lazzarino (19 May 1933) is a former female tennis player from Italy who reached the semifinals at 1954 French Championships. In doubles she reached the French semifinals in 1953, 1957 and 1964. Her best results at Wimbledon was reaching the third round in singles in 1960 and the quarterfinals in doubles in 1954 and 1960. She partnered with Lea Pericoli to reach five women's doubles finals in six years (1962-65, 1967) at the Italian International Championships, with four of those coming in consecutive years. ==See also== * Best result of an Italian tennis player in Grand Slam ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Italian female tennis players Category:Living people Category:Tennis players from Rome
title: Silvana Lazzarino
